thread.title: Augustus Sol Invictus says Alan Grayson message is a “Hate Rant”
thread.title_full: Augustus Sol Invictus says Alan Grayson message is a “Hate Rant”

author: Frank Torres
title: Augustus Sol Invictus says Alan Grayson message is a “Hate Rant”
text:
Pinterest 0 
Libertarian Candidate for U.S Senate Augustus Sol Invictus is accusing Congressman Alan Grayson , who’s also running for the same seat, of issuing a hate rant against religious minorities. 
“It is disconcerting that a Democratic candidate for the United States Senate would feel so free to denigrate a religious minority while pretending to value religious liberty,” said Invictus. “It is shocking that a Jew would be so willing to engage in blood libel, however more shocking still is that a candidate for public office would stoop so low to attack the religious rites of an opponent.” 
Yesterday, Grayson sent out an email message to supporters asking “Who drank goat blood” (story HERE ), which issued jabs at other candidates in the race, but said this specifically about Invictus… 
One of our opponents is a fascist masquerading as a libertarian who supports eugenics, is committed to starting a second Civil War, and once dismembered a goat and drank its blood… At a campaign fundraiser. (Just kidding about that last part.) 
Augustus Sol Invictus has been a controversial figure in Florida politics, who admitted sacrificing and drinking the blood of a goat as part of a religious ceremony. Shortly beforehand the Chairman of the state Libertarian party resigned. The local committee here in Seminole county disbanded, and two former Libertarians that were running for office changed parties. 
“If I were Catholic, Grayson would not dare criticize me for eating the flesh and drinking the blood of the Christ every Sunday.” concludes Invictus. Augustus Sol Invictus
